definition: yaodong (a kind of cave dwelling in the Loess Plateau in northwest China)/CL:孔[kong3]
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It is also named green architecture of city cave-house.
sentences.chinese: 这种建筑也可称为“城市窑洞”式绿色建筑。

sentences.english: He took pictures that were published in a book, "The Cliff Dwellers of the Mesa Verde."
sentences.chinese: 他拍了照片发表在《梅沙而第的悬崖窑洞》中。

sentences.english: Children run in the cave dwelling as an exercise, Qian County, Shaanxi Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 在陕西干县，窑洞里的孩子在进行跑步锻炼。

sentences.english: The cave at Yangjialing where Mao lived for five years has been well maintained.
sentences.chinese: 杨家岭毛曾经住过5年的窑洞一直得到良好的保修。

sentences.english: The people of Yenan live in cave houses carved into the slopes of dry loessial hills.
sentences.chinese: 延安人住在干燥的黄土山坡上挖的窑洞里。

sentences.english: I bet I can find that cave in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我敢打赌我能在_日本_找到那个窑洞。

sentences.english: After some discussion, they all trooped out of the cave and started a march on Landlord Wang's home.
sentences.chinese: 经过一番讨论后，大伙儿涌出窑洞，朝着王常盈家冲。

sentences.english: Inside a cave dwelling on slope, transmit the sound that little boy cries.
sentences.chinese: 坡上的一户窑洞内，传来小男孩哭泣的声音。

sentences.english: The storm destroyed the cottage, so they have to stay in a cave-house.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨把小屋冲坏，他们只好住在一个窑洞里。

sentences.english: Spruce Tree House is the third largest cliff dwelling in Mesa Verde National Park.
sentences.chinese: 云杉树屋是梅沙而第国家公园的第三大悬崖窑洞。

sentences.english: Cliff Palace is the largest cliff dwelling in Mesa Verde and also in North America.
sentences.chinese: 绝壁宫殿是梅沙而第和北美最大的悬崖窑洞。

sentences.english: These caves collapse easily in heavy rains.
sentences.chinese: 这种窑洞大雨时很容易倒塌。

sentences.english: The storm having destroyed their hut , they have to live in a cave .
sentences.chinese: 暴雨把房子冲坏了，他们只好住在一个窑洞里。

sentences.english: This cave echoes back every word you speak.
sentences.chinese: 你在这个窑洞里说的每一个字都发出回声。

sentences.english: Spruce Tree House is the easiest cliff dwelling to visit.
sentences.chinese: 云杉树屋是最早的有人游览的悬崖窑洞。

sentences.english: From this cave-room the chairman directed the work of our Party.
sentences.chinese: 主席在这间窑洞指导我们全党的工作。

definition: Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
courtyard house with a fully enclosed courtyard (type of Chinese residence)
central room of a traditional Chinese house
residence consisting of structures surrounding a courtyard on three sides
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
